1481820.name: DreamScript
1481820.description:
Play and program the game at the same time!

DreamScript is an experimental first-person puzzle game where you solve puzzles by reprogramming the environment. Take control of the game logic and rewrite the rules! Increase your speed and scale, modify object properties, spawn items, create bugs — use your creativity!

An adventure full of surprises awaits!

Key features:

  • 2-5 hour single-player story campaign

  • 18 levels

  • 6 unique environments

  • Steam achievements

  • Hidden collectibles

  • Speedrun mode and challenges

  • Programming guide

  • Steam Cloud save support

Target audience:

Puzzle game fans, adventure game fans, programming enthusiasts, educators, and schools
